review: Can I give this product no stars?! What a piece of worthless garbage!!!! We bought the Fire for our main tv upstairs and the Fire stick for downstairs. The fire stick is a complete waste of money. I can only watch Amazon on it. Netflix won't open and when it does I have to sign in again every time. Hulu doesn't work at all. Have been trying to watch a 45 min program and its taken more than double that! The screen freezes or goes black and I have to go back and resume again. Most of the time resuming again makes the show totally start over. If I try to fast forward it's more black or frozen screens. Absolute crap product unless you only watch Amazonj

review: Out of the box lacking, however, being able to sideload apps really makes this a great little device. Kodi(xbmc) is worth the price of admission by itself. It runs great. Unfortunately, I couldn't get hbo go running on this device (the play store version runs fine, but with no mouse you can't sign in/control the app). The amazon version doesn't even open (get an error). I still like chromecast for certain things, but like Kodi on the fire stick. Roku 3 still seems to be the fastest of all, though the fire stick is close.
author: Amazon Customer
